alert.note: Alert for Brown; Kewaunee; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:08AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Brown, central Kewaunee and north central Manitowoc Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 707 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Algoma to near Kewaunee to Denmark. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Algoma around 715 AM CDT. Kewaunee around 720 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
